definitions.text: a state of confusion and disorderliness
examples: she smoothed the mussiness of the bed

definitions.text: informal terms for a difficult situation
examples: he got into a terrible fix
he made a muddle of his marriage

definitions.text: a meal eaten in a mess hall by service personnel
a (large) military dining room where service personnel eat or relax
(often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
examples: he made a mint on the stock market
see the rest of the winners in our huge passel of photos

definitions.text: make a mess of or create disorder in
